page.title: 17SPORTS & RECREATION
page.content: There are few places reserved for{ {RECREATION}in this block. But there are people who live in the block who go to the social{CLUB}to play skittles or who use the large recreation ground. In a survey of peoples sporting interests a number of people said they play cricket at nearby Cherington. There is half of a football pitch in the block and a number of people play golf at the nearby Minchinhampton Golf Course. Horse riding is quite popular particularly with children and there is a good riding centre just out side the block.There are a number of bridle paths which give scenic rides through the Cotswold countryside. The most popular{SPORTS}are badminton, football and skittles. There is a skittle alley at the "The Cross Inn".
